Mosaic IntegrationÔÉÅ

We provide three examples of mosaic integration: the first integrates three simulated sections (RNA + protein) , the second integrates three mouse brain sections (RNA + H3K4me3) , and the third integrates three human tonsillar sections (RNA+protein).

Simulation (RNA+Protein, 3 sections)

Mouse brain (RNA+H3K4me3, 3 sections)

Tonsil (RNA+Protein, 3 sections)
